Posts.Content: Lynn, I had those calcifcation in the breast , but stopped drinking caffine drinks and candy choc . Hated to give up and I don't have anymore and my cyst were not cancerous and go back every year to a mammagram . I have had ultra sound also a test done . I talked with my GY and he said as long as I follow to lay off the coffe and other drinks no new fiber cyst have shown up . Try not to worry and if it is something then it is early . I go every year for my check up and don't put it off . Keep us posted .
Posts.Title: Calcifications
